Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect delays due to congestion. Traffic backups are approximately 2.5 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Congestion/Delay

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 265.3 in the City of Hampton, near La Salle avenue, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 162.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 1.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 103.5 in the County of Caroline, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
